context_bundle.summary: Enterprise-scale deployment tools for managing thousands of devices including SCCM/MECM, Microsoft Intune, Jamf Pro, PDQ Deploy, and configuration management platforms

onboarding.quick_start: Deploy at scale using MECM for on-premises Windows, Intune for cloud Windows/iOS/Android, Jamf Pro for Apple devices, or Ansible/Puppet for cross-platform infrastructure
common_patterns: MECM: Application deployment with distribution point groups
Intune: Win32 app deployment with compliance policies
Jamf Pro: Configuration profiles and Self Service catalog
PDQ Deploy: Agentless Windows deployment with scheduling
Ansible: Agentless automation via SSH with playbooks
Chef: Infrastructure as code with recipes and cookbooks
